title: Can Riot Ban Someone on the same IP that Try hack Your account but hack once
body:
Dear Riot,
                I have 2 roommates that also play league of legends tryn to hack my account they have the same IP as me basically because they are roommates that uses same internet.They use my account once and now tryn to hack it.Thank You

replies.body: They'll need a lot more than just the same IP to be able to hack your account. However, if you're concerned that they might get access I would suggest reaching out to our accounts team in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help you with securing your account and making sure it's safe in the future!
